title: 服务器区块错误 但查不到坐标
author: z1501382644
txt_content:
03.02 19:03:38 [Server] WARN Cauldron has removed EntityPhantomSwordBase['entity.flammpfeil.slashblade.PhantomSwordBase.name'/91455, l='world', x=-12642861874975118000000000000000000000000000.00, y=-2243759557754987700000000000000000000000000.00, z=25328327088665384000000000000000000000000000.00] to prevent a server crash.
03.02 19:03:38 [Server] WARN Entity is at -1.2642861874975118E43,2.5328327088665384E43 (chunk 2147483647,2147483647) but was stored in chunk -51,-56
03.02 19:03:38 [Server] WARN Wrong location for EntityPhantomSwordBase['entity.flammpfeil.slashblade.PhantomSwordBase.name'/91455, l='world', x=-12642861874975118000000000000000000000000000.00, y=-2243759557754987700000000000000000000000000.00, z=25328327088665384000000000000000000000000000.00] in world 'world'!



出现过几次了  但前几次都能找到具体坐标 这次找不到了
是拔刀剑的问题  拔刀剑按住幻影剑 瞬间就崩

replies.author: 浅念哥
replies.txt_content:
z1501382644 发表于 2017-2-3 19:31
这个区块的mca文件是什么？
内存溢出那个没有文件，是虚拟的(意思是没有那么大的区块)
触发区块r.51.-56.mca
ban物品可以用banitem nbt
应该可以用
http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-552368-1-1.html

replies.author: 浅念哥
replies.txt_content:
上面的坐标是溢出坐标
原因是由于实体区块范围过大导致内存溢出(chunk 2147483647,2147483647) 
触发区块是chunk -51,-56

replies.txt_content:

replies.txt_content:

ban物品可以用banitem n ...
